Data shared between threads: clients, malicious patterns, etc.
Accumulator_SharedMemory - Class in accumulator
Shared memory for the accumulator.
Accumulator_SharedMemory() - Constructor for class accumulator.Accumulator_SharedMemory

accumulatorConnection - Static variable in class node.Node_Main
The connection to the server.
Remember that all uses of this object should be synchronized.

accumulatorPort_String - Static variable in class node.Node_ConfigClass
 
active - Variable in class node.sharedMemory.StringPattern
Whether or not this pattern is active.
addConnection(String) - Method in class accumulator.Accumulator_SharedMemory
Adds the connection to the list of active connections or marks it as active if it already exists.
addDetection(int) - Method in class node.sharedMemory.DetectionFrequency
Increment the detection frequency by the given value for this event
addDetection() - Method in class node.sharedMemory.DetectionFrequency
Increment the detection frequency by one for this event
addInterface(PcapIf) - Method in class node.sharedMemory.Node_SharedMemory
If the interface is already in memory it will be marked as active
addInterface(PcapIf) - Method in class node.sharedMemory.SMPSM
Adds the interface if it doesn't exist or marks it as active if it does.
addIP(String) - Method in class node.sharedMemory.MPSM
 
addIP(String) - Method in class node.sharedMemory.Node_SharedMemory
If the malicious IP is already in the memory it will simply be marked as active
addIpEvent(StringPattern) - Method in class node.sharedMemory.InterfaceAddressStats
Adds the provided malicious IP detection event to the event list.
If the event entry does not exist, it will be created.
addIpEvent(StringPattern, PcapIf) - Method in class node.sharedMemory.InterfaceStatistics
Adds the detection of the provided IP.
If an entry already exists, its frequency will be incremented by one, else one will be created.
addIpEvent(StringPattern, PcapIf) - Method in class node.sharedMemory.SMPSM
Adds the ip detection event to memory.
If an entry for this ip does not exist, it will be created.
addMaliciousIP(String) - Method in class accumulator.Accumulator_SharedMemory
Adds a malicious IP pattern to memory
addMaliciousString(String) - Method in class accumulator.Accumulator_SharedMemory
Adds a malicious String pattern to memory
addr - Variable in class node.sharedMemory.InterfaceAddressStats
The address the interface had during detection.
addString(String) - Method in class node.sharedMemory.MPSM
 
addString(String) - Method in class node.sharedMemory.Node_SharedMemory
If the malicious string already exists in memory it will simply be marked as active
addStringEventCollection(LinkedList<StringPatternDetectionEvents>) - Method in class node.sharedMemory.InterfaceAddressStats
If the events do not exist they will be created.
addStringEventCollection(LinkedList<StringPatternDetectionEvents>, PcapIf) - Method in class node.sharedMemory.InterfaceStatistics
Adds a list of string patterns that had a match to this interface's statistics.
addStringEventCollection(LinkedList<StringPatternDetectionEvents>, PcapIf) - Method in class node.sharedMemory.SMPSM
Adds a list of string patterns that had a match to this interface's statistics.
argList - Static variable in class node.Node_Main
The arguments of this program given as a list
